subtitle: Por favor, junte-se a nos para a nossa festa de casamento em
ourStory: Este é um resumo da nossa história
theWedding: Junte-se a nós para celebrar uma noite de nosso amor e vida juntos. Na costa do Lago de Como, o Hotel Villa Cipressi cria o clima para uma escapadela romântica perfeita onde nos casaremos. Mas detalles a seguir
gallery: Aqui está uma galeria de imagens
accommodations: If you wish to stay at Hotel Villa Cipressi or Royal Victoria, we have a discounted rate for our guests. You may contact the hotel directly by email (info@hotelvillacipressi.it) let you need to book a room to attend Karen Ardila and Lucas de Souza’s wedding from September 12-14th 2023
howToArrive: Once in the Milan airport, guests will take the Milano Centrale to Varenna- esino train station arriving directly in Varenna
travelAgent: If you wish to visit other places in Europe, our travel agent Luciane Garcia will be happy to help you with the plane tickets, planning your itinerary, and finding accommodations. Please note bookings can only be made as early as October 2022
transportation: Safe Airport Transfers to and from Lake Como - Milan Area

story.name: First met
story.text: We first met at a mutual friend"s Halloween party

story.name: Started dating
story.text: We quickly fell in love and became high school sweethearts

story.name: Start of our life together
story.text: We got our first apartment and moved out together with our two dogs, Toto & Chloe

story.name: Home sweet home
story.text: We bought our first home and gave our dogs the backyard they deserved

story.name: She said yes
story.text: We got engaged while watching the most beautiful sunset on a sailboat in Croatia
